div.h2:
Middle/High, 708 Bridge St.
Elementary, 111 S. 4th St.
P.O. Box 517, Cornell, WI 54732
Phone 715-861-6947
Fax 715-239-6587

a.span: Process of Getting Information to the School Board
Mrs. L. Bowe MS/HS Special Ed

div.div: The last day of school will be (F) May 29th.
At this time, graduation will not be able to be in the gym on (F) June 5th. We are waiting on guidance to see if/how big of a group we may be able to have at the football field.

Cornell, Lake Holcombe, Gilman, Cadott, Stanley-Boyd, Bruce & New Auburn together offer eSucceed Charter School on-line. To see more information about this on-line charter school please click on the link.
https://esucceed.org

p.span: Cornell is very proud of their school system and the accomplishments that have been made academically for students and financially for the taxpayers of the district. There are excellent employees working in the district that take pride in their work. The community has been generous in their support of the schools and this strong commitment is greatly appreciated. Please feel free to visit our schools at any time and consider joining us in our educational endeavors.
Dr. Paul M. Schley, Superintendent/Director of SPED/Elementary Principal;
Dr. Schley's Monthly "Focus on Your School" Articles are found under the District Tab.

span.span: Congratulations to Cornell Elementary for being chosen as a 2020, 2019, 2018, 2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, & 2012 Wisconsin School of Recognition! Cornell Elementary is also a 2010 National Blue Ribbon School!

Congratulations to the Cornell H.S. for being a 2016 & 2015 Wisconsin School of Recognition;U.S. News & World Report Bronze rated school 2018, 2017, 2016 &2015; CVTC Dual Credit Award Winner: 2019, 2018, 2017 & 2016 Gold & 2015 Silver!
Congratulations to Cornell M.S. for being a 2018 & 2017 Wisconsin School of Recognition!

div.p: If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know that accessibility issue you are having by contacting Allison Spegal, District Administrative Assitant at 715-861-6969 or aspegal@cornell.k12.wi.us. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternative format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible.
